description.value:
1st level Clerics get access to Cleric Spells, which consists of 1st through 7th level spells. However, you do not have access to all of them right away. These spell levels become accessible as follows:

Cleric Spell Levels

Spell LevelUnlock Requirements
Level 1 Spells1st Level Cleric.
Level 2 Spells2nd Level Cleric;
3rd Level Overall.
Level 3 Spells3rd Level Cleric;
5th Level Overall
(At least 4 of these levels must be in Spellcaster classes).
Level 4 Spells4th Level Cleric;
7th Level Overall
(At least 6 of these levels must be in Spellcaster classes).
Level 5 Spells5th Level Cleric;
9th Level Overall
(At least 8 of these levels must be in Spellcaster classes).
Level 6 Spells6th Level Cleric;
11th Level Overall
(At least 10 of these levels must be in Spellcaster classes).
Level 7 Spells7th Level Cleric;
13th Level Overall
(At least 12 of these levels must be in Spellcaster classes).
